Text: Cc I understand that some students in E have not received the emails I have been sending out I am not sure whether this is because they are not on the email list or whether there is something the matter with the emails I hope that this one does get to you Here is a copy of the HW problem solutions They should also be on the web You can get to them either through Pf Berks website or by going to mine at duggar and then clicking on the B link Madhur EHWdoc
Revew Outline on Course websiteAn outline of the review session is now up on the wesbite under the Homwework solutions link Good luck to you all Madhur

Midterm Solutions by Friday NightGuys I just wanted you to know that I am currently working on posting the Mid term solutions on the web They should be available by tonight I apologize the delay and thanks for your patience Madhur Duggar
Midterm solutions Cc Guys Here is the file with the midterm solutions I will post these on the web on Satuday morning Madhur E Midterm Solutionsdoc

Group List and MidtermsEveryone Attached is a list of the group lists I have received from you Please check and if there is a change please let me know Also some of them might have vacancies Also your midterms are in the Evening MBA office You can collect them from there Pf Berk has asked me to let you to know that his policy is to regrade your entire exam should you request the regrade of any particular question Madhur Group Listsdoc
No Office Hours on Thursday Nov folks I will not be able to hold office hours this Thursday Nov However I will hold office hours on Monday rd between and pm to make up Madhur Duggar

Review Session for FinalThere will be a review session for the final exam The session will be on from am onwards The session will be in C As before the goal will be for you to ask questions and for us to come up with answers I will not have a lecture planned in advance

Correction in HW afolks Attached is a revised copy of the solutions to HW In particular there was an error in problem a There are two changes and both have been bolded The numerical answer to the question has not changed I shall also be sending you a document containing a detailed answer for one of the quiz questions that we had gone over in the review session but not clearly enough Expect it by tomorrow morning Madhur EHWbdoc

folks A revised copy of the solutions to Quiz are now up on the web They are on the web page with the solutions to the optional homeworks If you click on the optional homework solutions link on Pf Berks page that should take you there The link to the quiz solutions is at the end of the page
